data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_0a8e2a3db4ba0038d4d2932fa5dff306.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Each skill cast grants extra range on Odette's next Basic Attack within 8s and causes it to bounce between enemies (or an enemy and herself if only one enemy is in range), dealing 144-200<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> per hit.

Odette's skills will also trigger this effect when hitting an enemy. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

Odette releases a magic swan in the target direction, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

Odette releases a set of magic energy balls in the target direction, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.5s. After hitting an enemy, another energy ball will split off and attack a nearby enemy (prioritizes enemy heroes), dealing them 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and immobilizing them for 1.5s.

Odette begins to dance, gaining a 1400<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> shield while dealing up to 2400<font color="62f8fe"> (+900% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in a large area around her for 5s. The bounce speed and frequency of <font color="a6aafb">Lakeshore Ambience</font>'s sound wave in the area are also enhanced when the skill is active.
Use again while the skill is active to dash in the target direction.
<font color="A4AAC7">The skill is a channeling cast and will be interrupted if Odette is hit by high level control effects (knocked airborne, transformed, etc.) or if she performs another action.</font>

data.name: Odette

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Enough survivability to allow Ultimate to deal its damage.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with skills deals <%Num1> of target's Max HP as extra [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] and restores <%Num2> Mana on hit.########[8098ab]If the hero does not use Mana, recovers <%Num4> HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to <Num5>[-].########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

recommendmasterplan.name: BF - Kodjikk
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Innocent princess that grew up in the Swan Castle and genius mage that excels in sword and scepter.

assist.desc: Pair Odette with heroes who can relocate their teammates like Johnson and Jawhead to make it easier for her to find the perfect position for her Ultimate.

strong.desc: Odette's Ultimate is capable of unleashing massive damage and is effective against heroes lacking interruption skills, such as Layla and Irithel.

weak.desc: Odette is countered by heroes with Crowd Control skills, such as Minotaur and Edith, because they can easily interrupt her Ultimate.
